cast.name: 奈尔·贝拉克达尔 Neil Belakhdar

introduction: Leon is an older teen who one day leaves his squalid council flat and breaks into an upmarket home nearby. He quickly kidnaps a little boy (Max - played by Ludwig & Leopold Hilz). Nothing particularly threatening seems involved in this…Leon takes the boy to the local aquarium for a look-see, and visits what appears to be an old girlfriend. The boy’s parents come to meet the pair and take the boy away again. There’s more to this, though…
